channel.title: Tree Reviews BadScapes #1 - RageX
channel.description:
I thought every week I would pick a server from the advertisement board and just comment on what I find. Quality is potato. This week I chose a new server called RageX (https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,668854.0.html)
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-mOtXwAxFUE[/youtube]
Enjoy. Or not. I don't really care.

item.title: Tree Reviews BadScapes #1 - RageX
item.dc:creator: @djzone djzone
item.description:
@djzone wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:30, topic:550001”][quote author=djzone link=topic=668878.msg4474188#msg4474188 date=1424768944]

this is a good idea, but please do it on your own, lel. if you start hiring the wrong people to help you they’re not going to give ‘a review’, but rather a ‘i can make a better server thn this roflmfao this kids cant javac hehe my netwerking is btr’

looking forward to see more

lol@ you guys thinking the average p server is worth 10 minutes of your time

Yeah don’t hire Frell :o

I’m sure he’s not doing the series because he WANTS to play the average p server
[/quote]
No one who’s been here for any amount of time plays private servers nevermind wants to play them. He’s probably doing it to do something constructive and pass the time.[/quote]

Which is good, I just want to see him do it right rather than turning it into a troll fest

Read full topic

item.title: Tree Reviews BadScapes #1 - RageX
item.dc:creator: @justaguy justaguy
item.description:
@justaguy wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:27, topic:550001”][quote author=justaguy link=topic=668878.msg4474144#msg4474144 date=1424751659]
Why not just do a full-length video but at the end/beginning have a quick 60 second summary of the server or something?
[/quote]

[quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=668878.msg4474137#msg4474137 date=1424748873]
Ok sureeee but you should make a 60 second video to highlight your review video. Like an advertisement video for your review. This way you get the best of both worlds.
[/quote][/quote]

Yes but two separate videos seem redundant doesn’t it?

Read full topic

item.title: Tree Reviews BadScapes #1 - RageX
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I think 8-10 minutes is better IMO.

I just leave it in the background playing while listening, its better to have them that little longer for that reason.

Just my reasoning I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: Tree Reviews BadScapes #1 - RageX
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

No, that’s stupid. DO NOT make them longer. You should make them roughly 3 mins. There are some statistical analysis on video timing, Jimmy Fallen uses the 3 min rule with 80% of his videos being 3-4 mins in length.

You should take more time to get to the point rather than wasting peoples times. Your review should act as a advertisement as well. Once you’re popular than people can request for your channel to advertise their server thus making you valuable.

Just my two cents.

Read full topic

item.title: Tree Reviews BadScapes #1 - RageX
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Good work Tree. GO FORWARD AND DO THIS.

Read full topic

item.title: Tree Reviews BadScapes #1 - RageX
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

I planned on doing this weekly but I’m going to delay the next one so I can add a bit more production quality to it. I’m also awaiting a microphone delivery so I’ll properly ramp it up at the start of next month.

The videos:

  • will be longer. I want to properly review them.
  • will include a new guest each week. That way it’s just not me ranting and I’m not very active within the private server community so I’ll be relying on their insight.
  • The review will go over as many points as possible, with cut footage and will result in a yes or no verdict.

I also want to launch a monthly Moparscape podcast going over what has happened each month and then launch a Runescape cheating history series.
All in good time.

Read full topic

item.title: Tree Reviews BadScapes #1 - RageX
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“djzone, post:13, topic:550001”]this is a good idea, but please do it on your own, lel. if you start hiring the wrong people to help you they’re not going to give ‘a review’, but rather a ‘i can make a better server thn this roflmfao this kids cant javac hehe my netwerking is btr’

also i understand its a brief review but it’s a little harsh because you can’t really review a server in 7 minutes… maybe change the name or be more serious in the topic title? cause when i saw “badscapes” i immediately thought, cool a troll review of a mopar member slating a server. never seen that before…

looking forward to see more[/quote]

Having Hadyn with him wouldn’t be a bad idea since he could actually give tips to the creators on content and a better way to handle things when our glorious almighty Groot can give the creator a bit of insight in a first impressions style.

Read full topic
